quality_check.strandedness: <Stranded-Reverse/Stranded-Forward/Unstranded> (optional, if not specified, we will try to guess using ngsderive)
quality_check.phred_encoding: <sanger/illumina1.3> (optional, if not specified, we will try to guess using ngsderive. Only needed for WGS/WES)
quality_check.sequencErr.output_count_fi: <true/false> Whether to output granular count file. Result file is large; uncompressed can reach over half input BAM size, compressed can be ~10% BAM size. (default = false)
